summary:
Welcome to KAPPA - KAPPA is inspired by the legendary Kappa emote, the greyscale face of John DeSuno, which has become an iconic symbol on Twitch.Originally an Easter egg from Justin.tv, the Kappa emote evolved into a versatile tool for sarcasm, irony, and humor.KAPPA takes this legacy and amplifies it, ensuring that the elusive Golden Kappa is no longer a fleeting dream but a shared experience.

 $KAPPA Tokenomics - COME AND GET YOUR GOLDEN KAPPA
